qa_pairs.competency_question: What are the range of natural soil formation rates reported from several studies and what range of tolerable soil loss for Europe did Verheijen et al. (2009) calculate based on European soil formation data, including the corresponding reduction in soil depth per year?
qa_pairs.sparql_query:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX she: <https://soilwise-he.github.io/soil-health#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX qudt: <http://qudt.org/schema/qudt/>
PREFIX unit: <http://qudt.org/vocab/unit/>
PREFIX sorelm: <http://sweetontology.net/relaMath/>
PREFIX om: <http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/>
PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>

SELECT ?itemDescription ?valueOrInterval ?unitLabel ?sourceLabel
WHERE {
  {
    she:SoilFormationRates skos:prefLabel ?sfrLabel .
    she:SoilFormationRates af-x:AFX_0002696 ?rateNode .
    ?rateNode sorelm:hasInterval ?intervalValue .
    ?rateNode qudt:unit ?unitURI .
    BIND(STRAFTER(STR(?unitURI), STR(unit:)) AS ?unitStr)
    ?rateNode dcterms:source ?sourceURI .
    OPTIONAL { ?sourceURI skos:prefLabel ?sLabelOpt . }
    OPTIONAL { ?sourceURI dcterms:date ?sDateOpt . }
    BIND(COALESCE(?sLabelOpt, IF(BOUND(?sDateOpt), CONCAT(STR(?sourceURI)," (",STR(?sDateOpt),")"), STR(?sourceURI))) AS ?sourceDisplay)

    BIND(?sfrLabel AS ?itemDescription)
    BIND(?intervalValue AS ?valueOrInterval)
    BIND(?unitStr AS ?unitLabel)
    BIND(?sourceDisplay AS ?sourceLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    she:SoilFormationRates skos:prefLabel ?sfrLabel_val .
    she:SoilFormationRates om:hasValue ?valueNode .
    ?valueNode qudt:numericValue ?numericValue .
    ?valueNode qudt:unit ?unitURI_val .
    BIND(STRAFTER(STR(?unitURI_val), STR(unit:)) AS ?unitStr_val)
    ?valueNode dcterms:source ?sourceURI_val .
    OPTIONAL { ?sourceURI_val skos:prefLabel ?sLabelOpt_val . }
    OPTIONAL { ?sourceURI_val dcterms:date ?sDateOpt_val . }
    BIND(COALESCE(?sLabelOpt_val, IF(BOUND(?sDateOpt_val), CONCAT(STR(?sourceURI_val)," (",STR(?sDateOpt_val),")"), STR(?sourceURI_val))) AS ?sourceDisplay_val)

    BIND(?sfrLabel_val AS ?itemDescription)
    BIND(STR(?numericValue) AS ?valueOrInterval)
    BIND(?unitStr_val AS ?unitLabel)
    BIND(?sourceDisplay_val AS ?sourceLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    she:TolerableSoilLossRate skos:prefLabel ?tslrLabel .
    she:TolerableSoilLossRate af-x:AFX_0002696 ?tslrNode .
    ?tslrNode prov:atLocation she:Europe .
    she:Europe skos:prefLabel ?europeLabel .
    ?tslrNode sorelm:hasInterval ?tslrIntervalValue .
    ?tslrNode qudt:unit ?tslrUnitURI .
    BIND(STRAFTER(STR(?tslrUnitURI), STR(unit:)) AS ?tslrUnitStr)
    ?tslrNode dcterms:source ?tslrSourceURI .
    OPTIONAL { ?tslrSourceURI skos:prefLabel ?tslrSourceLabelOpt . }
    OPTIONAL { ?tslrSourceURI dcterms:date ?tslrSourceDateOpt . }
    BIND(COALESCE(?tslrSourceLabelOpt, IF(BOUND(?tslrSourceDateOpt), CONCAT(STR(?tslrSourceURI)," (",STR(?tslrSourceDateOpt),")"), STR(?tslrSourceURI))) AS ?tslrSourceDisplay)

    BIND(CONCAT(?tslrLabel, " (for ", ?europeLabel, ")") AS ?itemDescription)
    BIND(?tslrIntervalValue AS ?valueOrInterval)
    BIND(?tslrUnitStr AS ?unitLabel)
    BIND(?tslrSourceDisplay AS ?sourceLabel)
  }
}
ORDER BY ?itemDescription ?sourceLabel ?unitLabel
qa_pairs.expected_answer: Soil formation rates found in the literature vary quite significantly, as early studies report rates of 0.05-0.5mm per year (≈1t/ha/year) (Wakatsuki et al., 1992) or 1.4-2t/ha/year (Verheijen et al., 2009), while recent ones suggest that soil production can be 3.2-4.5t/ha/year (Egli et al., 2014). According to Montgomery (2007), the soil naturally develops at an average rate of 0.173mm/year resulting in an increase of 2.2t/ha/year. Verheijen et al. (2009) used European data on soil formation to calculate a tolerable soil loss for Europe of 0.3-1.4t/ha/year (a reduction in depth of 0.02-0.11mm/year).

qa_pairs.competency_question: How did Smith (1941) define tolerable soil loss in relation to soil fertility and crop productivity, what range of tolerable loss rates was identified in stakeholder workshops in the United States in the late 1950s and early 1960s, and what two specific tolerable soil loss thresholds are mentioned for different soil depths in Switzerland?
qa_pairs.sparql_query:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX she: <https://soilwise-he.github.io/soil-health#>
PREFIX qudt: <http://qudt.org/schema/qudt/>
PREFIX unit: <http://qudt.org/vocab/unit/>
PREFIX sorelm: <http://sweetontology.net/relaMath/>

PREFIX sorelsp: <http://sweetontology.net/relaSpace/>
PREFIX agrontology: <http://aims.fao.org/aos/agrontology#>

SELECT ?itemDescription ?predicateURI ?objectLabel ?unitLabel ?contextDescription
WHERE {
  {
    she:TolerableSoilLoss skos:prefLabel ?tslLabel .
    she:TolerableSoilLoss skos:definition ?definition .

    BIND(?tslLabel AS ?itemDescription)
    BIND(skos:definition AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(?definition AS ?objectLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    she:TolerableSoilLossRates skos:prefLabel ?tslrLabel_us .
    she:TolerableSoilLossRates af-x:AFX_0002696 ?usNode .
    ?usNode prov:atLocation she:UnitedStates .
    she:UnitedStates skos:prefLabel ?usLabel .
    ?usNode sorelm:hasInterval ?usInterval .
    ?usNode qudt:unit unit:TONNE-PER-HA-YR .
    ?usNode she:isConvertedFrom ?usOriginalUnits .
    ?usNode time:years ?usYears .

    BIND(?tslrLabel_us AS ?itemDescription)
    BIND(CONCAT(STR(af-x:AFX_0002696), " / ", STR(sorelm:hasInterval)) AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(?usInterval AS ?objectLabel)
    BIND("t/ha/year" AS ?unitLabel)
    BIND(CONCAT("in ", ?usLabel, ", converted from ", ?usOriginalUnits, " (", ?usYears, ")") AS ?contextDescription)
  }
  UNION
  {
    she:TolerableSoilLossRates skos:prefLabel ?tslrLabel_ch_shallow .
    she:TolerableSoilLossRates sorelm:hasThreshold ?chShallowNode .
    ?chShallowNode prov:atLocation she:Switzerland .
    she:Switzerland skos:prefLabel ?chLabel_shallow .
    ?chShallowNode agrontology:isUsedIn she:ShallowSoils .
    she:ShallowSoils skos:prefLabel ?shallowSoilsLabel .
    she:ShallowSoils sorelsp:hasMaximumDepth ?shallowDepthValue .
    she:ShallowSoils qudt:unit unit:CentiM .
    ?chShallowNode sorelm:hasUpperBound ?chShallowRate .
    ?chShallowNode qudt:unit unit:TONNE-PER-HA-YR .

    BIND(?tslrLabel_ch_shallow AS ?itemDescription)
    BIND(CONCAT(STR(sorelm:hasThreshold), " / ", STR(sorelm:hasUpperBound)) AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(STR(?chShallowRate) AS ?objectLabel)
    BIND("t/ha/year" AS ?unitLabel)
    BIND(CONCAT("for ", ?shallowSoilsLabel, " (< ", STR(?shallowDepthValue), " cm depth) in ", ?chLabel_shallow) AS ?contextDescription)
  }
  UNION
  {
    she:TolerableSoilLossRates skos:prefLabel ?tslrLabel_ch_deep .
    she:TolerableSoilLossRates sorelm:hasThreshold ?chDeepNode .
    ?chDeepNode prov:atLocation she:Switzerland .
    she:Switzerland skos:prefLabel ?chLabel_deep .
    ?chDeepNode agrontology:isUsedIn she:DeeplyDevelopedSoils .
    she:DeeplyDevelopedSoils skos:prefLabel ?deepSoilsLabel .
    ?chDeepNode sorelm:hasUpperBound ?chDeepRate .
    ?chDeepNode qudt:unit unit:TONNE-PER-HA-YR .

    BIND(?tslrLabel_ch_deep AS ?itemDescription)
    BIND(CONCAT(STR(sorelm:hasThreshold), " / ", STR(sorelm:hasUpperBound)) AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(STR(?chDeepRate) AS ?objectLabel)
    BIND("t/ha/year" AS ?unitLabel)
    BIND(CONCAT("for ", ?deepSoilsLabel, " in ", ?chLabel_deep) AS ?contextDescription)
  }
}
ORDER BY ?itemDescription ?predicateURI ?objectLabel
qa_pairs.expected_answer: Smith (1941) defined tolerable soil loss as 'the amount of soil that could be lost without a decline of fertility, thereby maintaining crop productivity indefinitely'. The range of tolerable loss rates identified in the United States in 1959 and 1962 is 2.24-11.21t/ha/year (converted from 1-5 t/acre/year). In Switzerland, the maximum tolerable soil loss is 2t/ha/year for shallow soils of less than 70cm depth. For deeply developed soils, the threshold is 4t/ha/year.

qa_pairs.expected_answer: Soil compaction harms the physical structure of soils and thus affects important ecological and economic soil functions, by reducing pore volume and pore continuity as well as particle surface accessibility. qa_pairs.expected_answer: Soil compaction occurs primarily if the internal soil strength (known as actual precompression stress) is exceeded by additional stress, for example from heavy machinery, dense trafficking and driving when soil moisture content is high. qa_pairs.expected_answer: Compaction increases the penetration resistance of the soil, while root growth and biological activity, like the frequency of earthworms, nematodes or collembolans, are reduced. qa_pairs.competency_question: What is a set of complex soil physical parameters that can document the consequences of soil compaction and soil degradation on physical, chemical and biological functions and what are their symbols and units, if any?
qa_pairs.sparql_query:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX she: <https://soilwise-he.github.io/soil-health#>
PREFIX qudt: <http://qudt.org/schema/qudt/>
PREFIX unit: <http://qudt.org/vocab/unit/>
PREFIX om: <http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX agrontology: <http://aims.fao.org/aos/agrontology#>

SELECT ?parameterLabel ?propertyURI ?valueLabel
WHERE {
  she:ComplexSoilPhysicalParameters skos:narrower ?parameterURI .
  ?parameterURI skos:prefLabel ?parameterLabel .

  {
    ?parameterURI qudt:unit ?unitValueURI .
    OPTIONAL { ?unitValueURI skos:prefLabel ?unitPrefLabel . }
    BIND(
      COALESCE(
        ?unitPrefLabel,
        IF( STRSTARTS(STR(?unitValueURI), STR(unit:)),
            STRAFTER(STR(?unitValueURI), STR(unit:)),
            IF( STRSTARTS(STR(?unitValueURI), STR(om:)),
                STRAFTER(STR(?unitValueURI), STR(om:)),
                STR(?unitValueURI)

    BIND(qudt:unit AS ?propertyURI)
    BIND(?unitDisplayLabel AS ?valueLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    ?parameterURI qudt:symbol ?symbolValue .
    BIND(qudt:symbol AS ?propertyURI)
    BIND(STR(?symbolValue) AS ?valueLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    ?parameterURI agrontology:isMeasuredBy ?measureNode .
    ?measureNode obo:RO_0020202 ?numerator .

    ?numerator skos:prefLabel ?numeratorLabel .
    ?denominator skos:prefLabel ?denominatorLabel .

    BIND(CONCAT(?numeratorLabel, " / ", ?denominatorLabel) AS ?valueLabel)

qa_pairs.expected_answer: The set of complex soil physical parameters are: precompression stress (kPa); contact area pressure (kPa); soil rigidity ratio = precompression stress (kPa)/actual soil stress (kPa); shear strength (kPa) (stiffness); hydraulic conductivity (K) (cm/d) and air permeability (K_l).

qa_pairs.competency_question: What soil threats and properties are indicated by the precompression stress and how is its value derived?
qa_pairs.sparql_query:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX she: <https://soilwise-he.github.io/soil-health#>
PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX af-x: <http://purl.allotrope.org/ontologies/property#>
PREFIX qudt: <http://qudt.org/schema/qudt/>
PREFIX unit: <http://qudt.org/vocab/unit/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
PREFIX om: <http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/>

SELECT ?subjectLabel ?predicateURI ?objectLabel ?contextLabel
WHERE {
  {
    she:PrecompressionStress skos:prefLabel ?psLabel_indicates .
    she:PrecompressionStress she:indicates ?sc .
    ?sc skos:prefLabel ?scLabel_indicated .

    BIND(?psLabel_indicates AS ?subjectLabel)
    BIND(she:indicates AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(?scLabel_indicated AS ?objectLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    she:PrecompressionStress sio:equivalentTo ?iss .
    ?iss skos:prefLabel ?issLabel_ams .
    ?iss obo:RO_0017004 ?bnode_ams .
    ?bnode_ams she:suffersFrom ?ams .
    ?ams skos:prefLabel ?amsLabel .

    BIND(?issLabel_ams AS ?subjectLabel)
    BIND(obo:RO_0017004 AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(she:suffersFrom AS ?objectLabel)
    BIND(?amsLabel AS ?contextLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    ?mpv skos:prefLabel ?mpLabel .
    ?mpv om:hasValue ?valueNode .
    ?valueNode obo:RO_0002508 she:PrecompressionStress .
    she:PrecompressionStress skos:prefLabel ?psLabel_mp .

    ?valueNode qudt:numericValue ?mpNumericValue .
    ?valueNode qudt:unit ?mpUnitURI .
    BIND(STRAFTER(STR(?mpUnitURI), STR(unit:)) AS ?mpUnitLabel)
    OPTIONAL { ?valueNode sio:equivalentTo ?pfValue . }

    OPTIONAL {
        ?valueNode af-x:AFX_0000408 ?condition .
        ?condition skos:prefLabel ?conditionLabel_opt .
    }
    OPTIONAL {
        ?valueNode time:hasDuration ?duration .
        ?duration skos:prefLabel ?durationLabel_opt .
    }
    BIND(CONCAT(
        COALESCE(?conditionLabel_opt, ""),
        IF(BOUND(?conditionLabel_opt) && BOUND(?durationLabel_opt), ", ", ""),
        COALESCE(?durationLabel_opt, ""),
        IF( (BOUND(?conditionLabel_opt) || BOUND(?durationLabel_opt)) && BOUND(?pfValue), CONCAT(" (", ?pfValue, ")"), COALESCE(CONCAT(" (",?pfValue,")"),"") )
    ) AS ?mpContext)

    BIND(CONCAT(?psLabel_mp, " at ", ?mpLabel) AS ?subjectLabel)
    BIND(om:hasValue AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(CONCAT(STR(?mpNumericValue), " ", ?mpUnitLabel) AS ?objectLabel)
    BIND(CONCAT("under conditions: ", ?mpContext) AS ?contextLabel)
  }
}
ORDER BY ?subjectLabel ?predicateURI ?objectLabel
qa_pairs.expected_answer: The precompression stress indicates the current state of compaction. The higher the soil strength, the lower the likelihood that it will suffer additional mechanical stress and long-term degradation of soil structure. The values for the precompression stress are determined under laboratory conditions and often quantified when the soil is most sensitive (usually in early spring at matric potential values of pF1.8 = -60hPa, or when drying due to evapotranspiration reduces the soil water content (pF2.5 or -300hPa matric potential).

qa_pairs.competency_question: How soil rigidity ratio is defined/calculated, and what range of values suggests that a soil structure is irreversibly deformed?
qa_pairs.sparql_query:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX she: <https://soilwise-he.github.io/soil-health#>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX agrontology: <http://aims.fao.org/aos/agrontology#>
PREFIX af-x: <http://purl.allotrope.org/ontologies/property#>
PREFIX sorelm: <http://sweetontology.net/relaMath/>

SELECT ?subjectLabel ?predicateURI ?objectLabel
WHERE {
  {
    she:SoilRigidityRatio skos:prefLabel ?srrLabel .
    she:SoilRigidityRatio skos:definition ?definition .
    BIND(?srrLabel AS ?subjectLabel)
    BIND(skos:definition AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(?definition AS ?objectLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    she:SoilRigidityRatio skos:prefLabel ?srrLabel_measured .
    she:SoilRigidityRatio agrontology:isMeasuredBy ?measureNode .
    ?measureNode obo:RO_0020202 ?aps .
    ?measureNode obo:RO_0020203 ?ass .
    ?aps skos:prefLabel ?apsLabel_measure .
    ?ass skos:prefLabel ?assLabel_measure .

    BIND(?srrLabel_measured AS ?subjectLabel)
    BIND(agrontology:isMeasuredBy AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(CONCAT(?apsLabel_measure, " / ", ?assLabel_measure) AS ?objectLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    {
      she:SoilRigidityRatio skos:prefLabel ?srrLabel_gt .
      she:SoilRigidityRatio sorelm:hasThreshold ?thresholdNode_gt .
      ?thresholdNode_gt agrontology:greaterThan ?threshold12 .
      ?thresholdNode_gt af-x:AFX_0002842 ?rssc .
      ?rssc skos:prefLabel ?rsscLabel .
      BIND(CONCAT(?srrLabel_gt, " > ", STR(?threshold12)) AS ?subjectLabel)
      BIND(af-x:AFX_0002842 AS ?predicateURI)
      BIND(?rsscLabel AS ?objectLabel)
    }
    UNION
    {
      she:SoilRigidityRatio skos:prefLabel ?srrLabel_gt .
      she:SoilRigidityRatio sorelm:hasThreshold ?thresholdNode_gt .
      ?thresholdNode_gt agrontology:greaterThan ?threshold12 .
      ?thresholdNode_gt af-x:AFX_0002727 ?cp .
      ?cp skos:prefLabel ?cpLabel_gt .
      BIND(CONCAT(?srrLabel_gt, " > ", STR(?threshold12)) AS ?subjectLabel)
      BIND(af-x:AFX_0002727 AS ?predicateURI)
      BIND(?cpLabel_gt AS ?objectLabel)
    }
  }
  UNION
  {
    she:SoilRigidityRatio skos:prefLabel ?srrLabel_lt .
    she:SoilRigidityRatio sorelm:hasThreshold ?thresholdNode_lt .
    ?thresholdNode_lt agrontology:smallerThan ?threshold08 .
    ?thresholdNode_lt af-x:AFX_0002842 ?ids .
    ?ids skos:prefLabel ?idsLabel .

    BIND(CONCAT(?srrLabel_lt, " < ", STR(?threshold08)) AS ?subjectLabel)
    BIND(af-x:AFX_0002842 AS ?predicateURI)
    BIND(?idsLabel AS ?objectLabel)
  }
  UNION
  {
    {
      she:SoilRigidityRatio skos:prefLabel ?srrLabel_interval .
      she:SoilRigidityRatio sorelm:hasThreshold ?thresholdNode_interval .
      ?thresholdNode_interval sorelm:hasInterval ?interval .
      ?thresholdNode_interval agrontology:causes ?sd .
      ?sd skos:prefLabel ?sdLabel_interval .
      BIND(CONCAT(?srrLabel_interval, " ", STR(?interval)) AS ?subjectLabel)
      BIND(agrontology:causes AS ?predicateURI)
      BIND(?sdLabel_interval AS ?objectLabel)
    }
    UNION
    {
      she:SoilRigidityRatio skos:prefLabel ?srrLabel_interval .
      she:SoilRigidityRatio sorelm:hasThreshold ?thresholdNode_interval .
      ?thresholdNode_interval sorelm:hasInterval ?interval .
      ?thresholdNode_interval obo:RO_0002552 ?affectedEntity_interval .
      ?affectedEntity_interval skos:prefLabel ?affectedEntityLabel_interval .
      BIND(CONCAT(?srrLabel_interval, " ", STR(?interval)) AS ?subjectLabel)
      BIND(obo:RO_0002552 AS ?predicateURI)
      BIND(?affectedEntityLabel_interval AS ?objectLabel)
    }
  }
}
ORDER BY ?subjectLabel ?predicateURI ?objectLabel
qa_pairs.expected_answer: Soil rigidity ratio is the ratio between the actual precompression stress (= internal soil strength) and the actual soil stress. Values above 1.2 define rigid soil structure conditions with no compaction processes, while values below 0.8 define structure as irreversibly deformed. Values in between classify soil properties and functions as very susceptible to further soil deformation.
